member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.License
member.summary: Provides methods to license the component.
member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As license = New license License.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic")

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.License.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Licenses the component.

remarks.p: Tries to find the license in the following locations:
2. The folder that contains the Aspose component assembly.
3. The folder that contains the client's calling assembly.
4. The folder that contains the entry (startup) assembly.
5. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.
Note:On the .NET Compact Framework, tries to find the license only in these locations:
2. An embedded resource in the client's calling assembly.

member.example:
In this example, an attempt will be made to find a license file named MyLicense.lic in the folder that contains
the component, in the folder that contains the calling assembly, in the folder of the entry assembly and then in the embedded resources of the calling assembly.
[C#]
License license = new License(); license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic");
[Visual Basic]
Dim license As License = New License license.SetLicense("MyLicense.lic") Can be a full or short file name or name of an embedded resource. Use an empty string to switch to evaluation mode.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.License.SetLicense(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Licenses the component.
member.param: A stream that contains the license.

remarks.p: Use this method to load a license from a stream.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.License.IsLicensed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether product is licensed.
member.value: true if product is licensed; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Bmp.BitmapV5Header
member.summary: The BitmapV5Header structure is the bitmap information header file. It is an extended version of the BITMAPINFOHEADER structure. If bV5Height is negative, indicating a top-down DIB, bV5Compression must be either BI_RGB or BI_BITFIELDS. Top-down DIBs cannot be compressed. The Independent Color Management interface (ICM) 2.0 allows International Color Consortium (ICC) color profiles to be linked or embedded in DIBs (DIBs). See Using Structures for more information. When a DIB is loaded into memory, the profile data (if present) should follow the color table, and the bV5ProfileData should provide the offset of the profile data from the beginning of the BITMAPV5HEADER structure. The value stored in bV5ProfileData will be different from the value returned by the sizeof operator given the BITMAPV5HEADER argument, because bV5ProfileData is the offset in bytes from the beginning of the BITMAPV5HEADER structure to the start of the profile data. (Bitmap bits do not follow the color table in memory). Applications should modify the bV5ProfileData member after loading the DIB into memory. For packed DIBs, the profile data should follow the bitmap bits similar to the file format. The bV5ProfileData member should still give the offset of the profile data from the beginning of the BITMAPV5HEADER. Applications should access the profile data only when bV5Size equals the size of the BITMAPV5HEADER and bV5CSType equals PROFILE_EMBEDDED or PROFILE_LINKED.

member.summary: The BitmapDataType enumeration defines types of bitmap data formats.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBitmapDataType.BitmapDataTypePixel
member.summary: Specifies a bitmap image with pixel data.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBitmapDataType.BitmapDataTypeCompressed
member.summary: Specifies an image with compressed data.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushDataFlags
member.summary: The BrushData flags specify properties of graphics brushes, including the presence of optional data fields. These flags can be combined to specify multiple options.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushDataFlags.BrushDataPath
member.summary: This flag is meaningful in objects (section 2.2.2.29). If set, an object (section 2.2.2.6) MUST be specified in the BoundaryData field of the brush data object. If clear, an object (section 2.2.2.7) MUST be specified in the BoundaryData field of the brush data object.
member.remarks: Graphics brushes are specified by objects

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushDataFlags.BrushDataTransform
member.summary: This flag is meaningful in objects (section 2.2.2.24), objects, and objects (section 2.2.2.45). If set, a 2x3 world space to device space transform matrix MUST be specified in the OptionalData field of the brush data object.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushDataFlags.BrushDataPresetColors
member.summary: This flag is meaningful in EmfPlusLinearGradientBrushData and EmfPlusPathGradientBrushData objects. If set, an object (section 2.2.2.4) MUST be specified in the OptionalData field of the brush data object.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushDataFlags.BrushDataBlendFactorsH
member.summary: This flag is meaningful in EmfPlusLinearGradientBrushData and EmfPlusPathGradientBrushData objects. If set, an object (section 2.2.2.5) that specifies a blend pattern along a horizontal gradient MUST be specified in the OptionalData field of the brush data object.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushDataFlags.BrushDataBlendFactorsV
member.summary: This flag is meaningful in EmfPlusLinearGradientBrushData objects. If set, an EmfPlusBlendFactors object that specifies a blend pattern along a vertical gradient MUST be specified in the OptionalData field of the brush data object.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushDataFlags.BrushDataFocusScales
member.summary: This flag is meaningful in EmfPlusPathGradientBrushData objects. If set, an object (section 2.2.2.18) MUST be specified in the OptionalData field of the brush data object.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushDataFlags.BrushDataIsGammaCorrected
member.summary: This flag is meaningful in EmfPlusLinearGradientBrushData, EmfPlusPathGradientBrushData, and EmfPlusTextureBrushData objects. If set, the brush MUST already be gamma corrected; that is, output brightness and intensity have been corrected to match the input image.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushDataFlags.BrushDataDoNotTransform
member.summary: This flag is meaningful in EmfPlusTextureBrushData objects. If set, a world space to device space transform SHOULD NOT be applied to the texture brush.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushType
member.summary: The BrushType enumeration defines types of graphics brushes, which are used to fill graphics regions.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushType.BrushTypeSolidColor
member.summary: Specifies a solid-color brush, which is characterized by an value.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushType.BrushTypeHatchFill
member.summary: Specifies a hatch brush, which is characterized by a predefined pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushType.BrushTypeTextureFill
member.summary: Specifies a texture brush, which is characterized by an image.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushType.BrushTypePathGradient
member.summary: Specifies a path gradient brush, which is characterized by a color gradient path gradient brush data.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusBrushType.BrushTypeLinearGradient
member.summary: contains linear gradient brush data.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCombineMode
member.summary: The CombineMode enumeration defines modes for combining two graphics regions. In the following descriptions, the regions to be combined are referred to as the "existing" and "new" regions.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCombineMode.CombineModeReplace
member.summary: Replaces the existing region with the new region.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCombineMode.CombineModeIntersect
member.summary: Replaces the existing region with the intersection of the existing region and the new region.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCombineMode.CombineModeUnion
member.summary: Replaces the existing region with the union of the existing and new regions.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCombineMode.CombineModeXor
member.summary: Replaces the existing region with the XOR of the existing and new regions.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCombineMode.CombineModeExclude
member.summary: Replaces the existing region with the part of itself that is not in the new region.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCombineMode.CombineModeComplement
member.summary: Replaces the existing region with the part of the new region that is not in the existing region.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCompositingMode
member.summary: The CompositingMode enumeration defines modes for combining source colors with background colors. The compositing mode represents the enable state of alpha blending.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCompositingMode.CompositingModeSourceOver
member.summary: Enables alpha blending, which specifies that when a color is rendered, it is blended with the background color. The extent of blending is determined by the value of the alpha component of the color being rendered.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCompositingMode.CompositingModeSourceCopy
member.summary: Disables alpha blending, which means that when a source color is rendered, it overwrites the background color.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCompositingQuality
member.summary: The CompositingQuality enumeration defines levels of quality for creating composite images

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCompositingQuality.CompositingQualityDefault
member.summary: No gamma correction is performed. Gamma correction controls the overall brightness and contrast of an image. Without gamma correction, composited images can appear too light or too dark.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCompositingQuality.CompositingQualityHighSpeed
member.summary: No gamma correction is performed. Compositing speed is favored at the expense of quality. In terms of the result, there is no difference between this value and CompositingQualityDefault.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCompositingQuality.CompositingQualityHighQuality
member.summary: Gamma correction is performed. Compositing quality is favored at the expense of speed.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCompositingQuality.CompositingQualityGammaCorrected
member.summary: Enable gamma correction for higher-quality compositing with lower speed. In terms of the result, there is no difference between this value and CompositingQualityHighQuality.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCompositingQuality.CompositingQualityAssumeLinear
member.summary: No gamma correction is performed; however, using linear values results in better quality than the default at a slightly lower speed.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveAdjustments
member.summary: The CurveAdjustments enumeration defines adjustments that can be applied to the color curve of an image.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveAdjustments.AdjustExposure
member.summary: Specifies the simulation of increasing or decreasing the exposure of an image.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveAdjustments.AdjustDensity
member.summary: Specifies the simulation of increasing or decreasing the density of an image.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveAdjustments.AdjustContrast
member.summary: Specifies an increase or decrease of the contrast of an image.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveAdjustments.AdjustHighlight
member.summary: Specifies an increase or decrease of the value of a color channel of an image, if that channel already has a value that is above half intensity. This adjustment can be used to increase definition in the light areas of an image without affecting the dark areas.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveAdjustments.AdjustShadow
member.summary: Specifies an increase or decrease of the value of a color channel of an image, if that channel already has a value that is below half intensity. This adjustment can be used to increase definition in the dark areas of an image without affecting the light areas.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveAdjustments.AdjustMidtone
member.summary: Specifies an adjustment that lightens or darkens an image. Color channel values in the middle of the intensity range are altered more than color channel values near the minimum or maximum extremes of intensity. This adjustment can be used to lighten or darken an image without losing the contrast between the darkest and lightest parts of the image.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveAdjustments.AdjustWhiteSaturation
member.summary: Specifies an adjustment to the white saturation of an image, defined as the maximum value in the range of intensities for a given color channel, whose range is typically 0 to 255.
member.remarks: For example, a white saturation adjustment value of 240 specifies that color channel values in the range 0 to 240 are adjusted so that they spread out over the range 0 to 255, with color channel values greater than 240 set to 255.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveAdjustments.AdjustBlackSaturation
member.summary: Specifies an adjustment to the black saturation of an image, which is the minimum value in the range of intensities for a given color channel, which is typically 0 to 255.
member.remarks: For example, a black saturation adjustment value of 15 specifies that color channel values in the range 15 to 255 are adjusted so that they spread out over the range 0 to 255, with color channel values less than 15 set to 0.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveChannel
member.summary: The CurveChannel enumeration defines color channels that can be affected by a color curve effect adjustment to an image.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveChannel.CurveChannelAll
member.summary: Specifies that a color curve adjustment applies to all color channels.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveChannel.CurveChannelRed
member.summary: Specifies that a color curve adjustment applies only to the red color channel.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveChannel.CurveChannelGreen
member.summary: Specifies that a color curve adjustment applies only to the green color channel.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCurveChannel.CurveChannelBlue
member.summary: Specifies that a color curve adjustment applies only to the blue color channel.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCustomLineCapDataFlags
member.summary: The CustomLineCapData flags specify data for custom line caps. These flags can be combined to specify multiple options.
member.remarks: Custom graphics line caps are specified by objects.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCustomLineCapDataFlags.CustomLineCapDataFillPath
member.summary: If set, an object MUST be specified in the OptionalData field of the object for filling the custom line cap.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCustomLineCapDataFlags.CustomLineCapDataLinePath
member.summary: If set, an object MUST be specified in the OptionalData field of the EmfPlusCustomLineCapData object for outlining the custom line cap.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCustomLineCapDataType
member.summary: The CustomLineCapDataType enumeration defines types of custom line cap data, which specify styles and shapes for the ends of graphics lines.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCustomLineCapDataType.CustomLineCapDataTypeDefault
member.summary: Specifies a default custom line cap.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusCustomLineCapDataType.CustomLineCapDataTypeAdjustableArrow
member.summary: Specifies an adjustable arrow custom line cap.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusDashedLineCapType
member.summary: The DashedLineCapType enumeration defines types of line caps to use at the ends of dashed lines that are drawn with graphics pens.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusDashedLineCapType.DashedLineCapTypeFlat
member.summary: Specifies a flat dashed line cap.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusDashedLineCapType.DashedLineCapTypeRound
member.summary: Specifies a round dashed line cap.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusDashedLineCapType.DashedLineCapTypeTriangle
member.summary: Specifies a triangular dashed line cap.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusDriverStringOptionsFlags
member.summary: The DriverStringOptions flags specify properties of graphics text positioning and rendering. These flags can be combined to specify multiple options.
member.remarks: Graphics text output is specified in records

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusDriverStringOptionsFlags.DriverStringOptionsCmapLookup
member.summary: If set, the positions of character glyphs SHOULD be specified in a character map lookup table. If clear, the glyph positions SHOULD be obtained from an array of coordinates.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusDriverStringOptionsFlags.DriverStringOptionsVertical
member.summary: If set, the string SHOULD be rendered vertically. If clear, the string SHOULD be rendered horizontally.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusDriverStringOptionsFlags.DriverStringOptionsRealizedAdvance
member.summary: If set, character glyph positions SHOULD be calculated relative to the position of the first glyph. If clear, the glyph positions SHOULD be obtained from an array of coordinates.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusDriverStringOptionsFlags.DriverStringOptionsLimitSubpixel
member.summary: If set, less memory SHOULD be used to cache anti-aliased glyphs, which produces lower quality text rendering. If clear, more memory SHOULD be used, which produces higher quality text rendering.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFilterType
member.summary: The FilterType enumeration defines types of filtering algorithms that can be used for text and graphics quality enhancement and image rendering.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFilterType.FilterTypeNone
member.summary: Specifies that filtering is not performed.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFilterType.FilterTypePoint
member.summary: Specifies that each destination pixel is computed by sampling the nearest pixel from the source image.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFilterType.FilterTypeLinear
member.summary: Specifies that linear interpolation is performed using the weighted average of a 2x2 area of pixels surrounding the source pixel.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFilterType.FilterTypeTriangle
member.summary: Specifies that each pixel in the source image contributes equally to the destination image. This is the slowest of filtering algorithms.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFilterType.FilterTypeBox
member.summary: Specifies a box filter algorithm, in which each destination pixel is computed by averaging a rectangle of source pixels. This algorithm is useful only when reducing the size of an image.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFilterType.FilterTypePyramidalQuad
member.summary: Specifies that a 4-sample tent filter is used.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFilterType.FilterTypeGaussianQuad
member.summary: Specifies that a 4-sample Gaussian filter is used, which creates a blur effect on an image.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFontStyleFlags
member.summary: The FontStyle flags specify styles of graphics font typefaces. These flags can be combined to specify multiple options.
member.remarks: Graphics font typefaces are specified by objects

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFontStyleFlags.FontStyleBold
member.summary: If set, the font typeface MUST be rendered with a heavier weight or thickness. If clear, the font typeface MUST be rendered with a normal thickness.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFontStyleFlags.FontStyleItalic
member.summary: If set, the font typeface MUST be rendered with the vertical stems of the characters at an increased angle or slant relative to the baseline. If clear, the font typeface MUST be rendered with the vertical stems of the characters at a normal angle.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFontStyleFlags.FontStyleUnderline
member.summary: If set, the font typeface MUST be rendered with a line underneath the baseline of the characters. If clear, the font typeface MUST be rendered without a line underneath the baseline.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusFontStyleFlags.FontStyleStrikeout
member.summary: If set, the font typeface MUST be rendered with a line parallel to the baseline drawn through the middle of the characters. If clear, the font typeface MUST be rendered without a line through the characters.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusGraphicsVersionEnum
member.summary: The GraphicsVersion enumeration defines versions of operating system graphics that are used to create EMF+ metafiles.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusGraphicsVersionEnum.GraphicsVersion1
member.summary: Specifies GDI+ version 1.0

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusGraphicsVersionEnum.GraphicsVersion1_1
member.summary: Specifies GDI+ version 1.1

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle
member.summary: The HatchStyle enumeration defines hatch patterns used by graphics brushes. A hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies equally spaced horizontal lines.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleVertical
member.summary: Specifies equally spaced vertical lines.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleForwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies lines on a diagonal from upper left to lower right.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleBackwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies lines on a diagonal from upper right to lower left.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleLargeGrid
member.summary: Specifies crossing horizontal and vertical lines.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDiagonalCross
member.summary: Specifies crossing forward diagonal and backward diagonal lines with anti-aliasing.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyle05Percent
member.summary: Specifies a 5-percent hatch, which is the ratio of foreground color to background color equal to 5:100.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyle10Percent
member.summary: Specifies a 10-percent hatch, which is the ratio of foreground color to background color equal to 10:100.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyle20Percent
member.summary: Specifies a 20-percent hatch, which is the ratio of foreground color to background color equal to 20:100.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyle25Percent
member.summary: Specifies a 20-percent hatch, which is the ratio of foreground color to background color equal to 20:100.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyle30Percent
member.summary: Specifies a 30-percent hatch, which is the ratio of foreground color to background color equal to 30:100.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyle40Percent
member.summary: Specifies a 40-percent hatch, which is the ratio of foreground color to background color equal to 40:100.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyle50Percent
member.summary: Specifies a 50-percent hatch, which is the ratio of foreground color to background color equal to 50:100.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyle60Percent
member.summary: Specifies a 60-percent hatch, which is the ratio of foreground color to background color equal to 60:100.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyle70Percent
member.summary: Specifies a 70-percent hatch, which is the ratio of foreground color to background color equal to 70:100.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyle75Percent
member.summary: Specifies a 75-percent hatch, which is the ratio of foreground color to background color equal to 75:100.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyle80Percent
member.summary: Specifies an 80-percent hatch, which is the ratio of foreground color to background color equal to 80:100.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyle90Percent
member.summary: Specifies a 90-percent hatch, which is the ratio of foreground color to background color equal to 90:100.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleLightDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the right from top to bottom points with no anti-aliasing. They are spaced 50 percent further apart than lines in the HatchStyleForwardDiagonal pattern

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleLightUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top to bottom points with no anti-aliasing. They are spaced 50 percent further apart than lines in the HatchStyleBackwardDiagonal pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDarkDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the right from top to bottom points with no anti-aliasing. They are spaced 50 percent closer and are twice the width of lines in the HatchStyleForwardDiagonal pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDarkUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top to bottom points with no anti-aliasing. They are spaced 50 percent closer and are twice the width of lines in the HatchStyleBackwardDiagonal pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleWideDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the right from top to bottom points with no anti-aliasing. They have the same spacing between lines in HatchStyleWideDownwardDiagonal pattern and HatchStyleForwardDiagonal pattern, but HatchStyleWideDownwardDiagonal has the triple line width of HatchStyleForwardDiagonal.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleWideUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top to bottom points with no anti-aliasing. They have the same spacing between lines in HatchStyleWideUpwardDiagonal pattern and HatchStyleBackwardDiagonal pattern, but HatchStyleWideUpwardDiagonal has the triple line width of HatchStyleWideUpwardDiagonal.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleLightVertical
member.summary: Specifies vertical lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than lines in the HatchStyleVertical pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleLightHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are spaced 50 percent closer than lines in the HatchStyleHorizontal pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleNarrowVertical
member.summary: Specifies vertical lines that are spaced 75 percent closer than lines in the HatchStyleVertical pattern; or 25 percent closer than lines in the HatchStyleLightVertical pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleNarrowHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are spaced 75 percent closer than lines in the HatchStyleHorizontal pattern; or 25 percent closer than lines in the HatchStyleLightHorizontal pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDarkVertical
member.summary: Specifies lines that are spaced 50 percent closer than lines in the HatchStyleVertical pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDarkHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies lines that are spaced 50 percent closer than lines in the HatchStyleHorizontal pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDashedDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies dashed diagonal lines that slant to the right from top to bottom points.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDashedUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies dashed diagonal lines that slant to the left from top to bottom points.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDashedHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies dashed horizontal lines.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDashedVertical
member.summary: Specifies dashed vertical lines.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleSmallConfetti
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of confetti.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleLargeConfetti
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of confetti, and is composed of larger pieces than the HatchStyleSmallConfetti pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleZigZag
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are composed of zigzags.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleWave
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are composed of tildes.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDiagonalBrick
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of layered bricks that slant to the left from top to bottom points.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleHorizontalBrick
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of horizontally layered bricks.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleWeave
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of a woven material.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStylePlaid
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of a plaid material.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDivot
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of divots.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDottedGrid
member.summary: Specifies crossing horizontal and vertical lines, each of which is composed of dots.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleDottedDiamond
member.summary: Specifies crossing forward and backward diagonal lines, each of which is composed of dots.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleShingle
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of diagonally layered shingles that slant to the right from top to bottom points.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleTrellis
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of a trellis.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleSphere
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of spheres laid adjacent to each other.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleSmallGrid
member.summary: Specifies crossing horizontal and vertical lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than HatchStyleLargeGrid.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleSmallCheckerBoard
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of a checkerboard.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleLargeCheckerBoard
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of a checkerboard, with squares that are twice the size of the squares in the pattern.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleOutlinedDiamond
member.summary: Specifies crossing forward and backward diagonal lines; the lines are not anti-aliased.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHatchStyle.HatchStyleSolidDiamond
member.summary: Specifies a pattern of lines that has the appearance of a checkerboard placed diagonally.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHotkeyPrefix
member.summary: The HotkeyPrefix enumeration defines output options for hotkey prefixes in graphics text.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHotkeyPrefix.HotkeyPrefixShow

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusHotkeyPrefix.HotkeyPrefixHide
member.summary: Specifies that the hotkey prefix SHOULD be displayed.

member.summary: The ImageDataType enumeration defines types of image data formats.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusImageDataType.ImageDataTypeUnknown
member.summary: The type of image is not known.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusImageDataType.ImageDataTypeBitmap

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusImageDataType.ImageDataTypeMetafile

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusImageEffectsIdentifiers
member.summary: The ImageEffects identifiers define standard GUIDs for specifying graphics image effects. These identifiers are used by device drivers to publish their levels of support for these effects. The identifier constants are defined using the GUID curly-braced string representation ([MS-DTYP] section 2.3.4.3).
member.remarks: Image effects identifiers and Image Effects Parameter Blocks are specified by records for records.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusImageEffectsIdentifiers.Contain(System.String)

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusInterpolationMode
member.summary: The InterpolationMode enumeration defines ways to perform scaling, including stretching and shrinking.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusInterpolationMode.InterpolationModeDefault
member.summary: Specifies the default interpolation mode, which is defined as InterpolationModeBilinear.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusInterpolationMode.InterpolationModeLowQuality
member.summary: Specifies a low-quality interpolation mode, which is defined as InterpolationModeNearestNeighbor.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusInterpolationMode.InterpolationModeHighQuality
member.summary: Specifies a high-quality interpolation mode, which is defined as InterpolationModeHighQualityBicubic.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusInterpolationMode.InterpolationModeBilinear
member.summary: Specifies bilinear interpolation, which uses the closest 2x2 neighborhood of known pixels surrounding the interpolated pixel. The weighted average of these 4 known pixel values determines the value to assign to the interpolated pixel. The result is smoother looking than InterpolationModeNearestNeighbor.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusInterpolationMode.InterpolationModeBicubic
member.summary: Specifies bicubic interpolation, which uses the closest 4x4 neighborhood of known pixels surrounding the interpolated pixel. The weighted average of these 16 known pixel values determines the value to assign to the interpolated pixel. Because the known pixels are likely to be at varying distances from the interpolated pixel, closer pixels are given a higher weight in the calculation. The result is smoother looking than InterpolationModeBilinear.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusInterpolationMode.InterpolationModeNearestNeighbor
member.summary: Specifies nearest-neighbor interpolation, which uses only the value of the pixel that is closest to the interpolated pixel. This mode simply duplicates or removes pixels, producing the lowest-quality result among these options.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusInterpolationMode.InterpolationModeHighQualityBilinear
member.summary: Specifies bilinear interpolation with prefiltering.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusInterpolationMode.InterpolationModeHighQualityBicubic
member.summary: Specifies bicubic interpolation with prefiltering, which produces the highest-quality result among these options.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfPlus.Consts.EmfPlusLanguageIdentifierType
member.summary: The LanguageIdentifier enumeration defines identifiers for natural languages in locales, including countries, geographical regions, and administrative districts.
member.remarks: Language identifiers are specified by objects (section 2.2.2.23). Each value is an encoding of a primary language identifier and a sublanguage identifier. See [MS-LCID] for additional information concerning language identifiers, including Windows version support.
