member.summary: Gets or sets the pen style.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfBasePen.Argb32ColorRef
member.summary: Gets or sets the 32-bit ARGB color reference.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfBitFix28To4
member.summary: The BitFIX28_4 object defines a numeric value in 28.4 bit FIX notation.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfBitFix28To4.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfBitFix28To4.IntVal
member.summary: Gets or sets the integer value value

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfBitFix28To4.FracValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the fraction value

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfBitFix28To4.Value
member.summary: Gets the resulting float value;

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment
member.summary: The ColorAdjustment object defines values for adjusting the colors in source bitmaps in bit-block transfers.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size in bytes of this object. This MUST be 0x0018.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment.Values
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies how to prepare the output image. This field can be set to NULL or to any combination of values in the ColorAdjustment enumeration (section 2.1.5).

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment.IlluminantIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the type of standard light source under which the image is viewed, from the Illuminant enumeration (section 2.1.19).

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment.RedGamma
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the nth power gamma correction value for the red primary of the source colors. This value SHOULD be in the range from 2,500 to 65,000. A value of 10,000 means gamma correction MUST NOT be performed.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment.GreenGamma
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the nth power gamma correction value for the green primary of the source colors. This value SHOULD be in the range from 2,500 to 65,000. A value of 10,000 means gamma correction MUST NOT be performed.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment.BlueGamma
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the nth power gamma correction value for the blue primary of the source colors. This value SHOULD be in the range from 2,500 to 65,000. A value of 10,000 means gamma correction MUST NOT be performed.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment.ReferenceBlack
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the black reference for the source colors. Any colors that are darker than this are treated as black. This value SHOULD be in the range from zero to 4,000

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment.ReferenceWhite
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the white reference for the source colors. Any colors that are lighter than this are treated as white. This value SHOULD be in the range from 6,000 to 10,000.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment.Contrast
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit signed integer that specifies the amount of contrast to be applied to the source object. This value SHOULD be in the range from 100 to 100. A value of zero means contrast adjustment MUST NOT be performed.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment.Brightness
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit signed integer that specifies the amount of brightness to be applied to the source object. This value SHOULD be in the range from 100 to 100. A value of zero means brightness adjustment MUST NOT be performed.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment.Colorfullness
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit signed integer that specifies the amount of colorfulness to be applied to the source object. This value SHOULD be in the range from 100 to 100. A value of zero means colorfulness adjustment MUST NOT be performed

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfColorAdjustment.RedGreenTint
member.summary: Gets or sets 16-bit signed integer that specifies the amount of red or green tint adjustment to be applied to the source object. This value SHOULD be in the range from 100 to 100. Positive numbers adjust towards red and negative numbers adjust towards green. A value of zero means tint adjustment MUST NOT be performed

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfDesignVector
member.summary: The DesignVector (section 2.2.3) object defines the design vector, which specifies values for the font axes of a multiple master font.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfDesignVector.Signature
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that MUST be set to the value 0x08007664.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfDesignVector.NumAxes
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the number of elements in the Values array. It MUST be in the range 0 to 16, inclusive

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfDesignVector.Values
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional array of 32-bit signed integers that specify the values of the font axes of a multiple master, OpenType font. The maximum number of values in the array is 16.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfEpsData
member.summary: The EpsData object is a container for EPS data

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfEpsData.SizeData
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the total size of this object, in bytes

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfEpsData.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the PostScript language level. This value MUST be 0x00000001

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfEpsData.Points
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of three Point28_4 objects (section 2.2.23) that defines the coordinates of the output parallelogram using 28.4 bit FIX notation
member.remarks: The upper-left corner of the parallelogram is the first point in this array, the upper-right corner is the second point, and the lower-left corner is the third point. The lower-right corner of the parallelogram is computed from the first three points (A, B, and C) by treating them as vectors.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfEpsData.PostScriptData
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of bytes of PostScript data. The length of this array can be computed from the SizeData field. This data MAY be used to render an image.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfFormat
member.summary: The EmrFormat object contains information that identifies the format of image data in an EMR_COMMENT_MULTIFORMATS record(section 2.3.3.4.3).

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfFormat.Signature
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the format of the image data. This value MUST be in the FormatSignature enumeration (section 2.1.14).

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfFormat.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the format version number. If the Signature field specifies encapsulated PostScript (EPS), this value MUST be 0x00000001; otherwise, this value MUST be ignored

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfFormat.SizeData
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size of the data in bytes

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfFormat.OffData
member.summary: Gets or sets 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the offset to the data from the start of the identifier field in an EMR_COMMENT_PUBLIC record (section 2.3.3.4). The offset MUST be 32-bit aligned.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfGradientRectangle
member.summary: The GradientRectangle object defines a rectangle using TriVertex objects (section 2.2.26) in an EMR_GRADIENTFILL record (section 2.3.5.12).

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfGradientRectangle.UpperLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets an index into an array of TriVertex objects that specifies the upper-left vertex of a rectangle. The index MUST be smaller than the size of the array, as defined by the nVer field of the EMR_GRADIENTFILL record.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfGradientRectangle.LowerRight
member.summary: Gets or sets an index into an array of TriVertex objects that specifies the lower-right vertex of a rectangle. The index MUST be smaller than the size of the array, as defined by the nVer field of the EMR_GRADIENTFILL record.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfGradientTriangle
member.summary: The GradientTriangle object defines a triangle using TriVertex objects (section 2.2.26) in an EMR_GRADIENTFILL record (section 2.3.5.12)

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfGradientTriangle.Vertex1
member.summary: Gets or sets an index into an array of TriVertex objects that specifies a vertex of a triangle. The index MUST be smaller than the size of the array, as defined by the nVer field of the EMR_GRADIENTFILL record.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfGradientTriangle.Vertex2
member.summary: Gets or sets an index into an array of TriVertex objects that specifies a vertex of a triangle. The index MUST be smaller than the size of the array, as defined by the nVer field of the EMR_GRADIENTFILL record.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfGradientTriangle.Vertex3
member.summary: Gets or sets an index into an array of TriVertex objects that specifies a vertex of a triangle. The index MUST be smaller than the size of the array, as defined by the nVer field of the EMR_GRADIENTFILL record.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderExtension1
member.summary: The HeaderExtension1 object defines the first extension to the EMF metafile header. It adds support for a PixelFormatDescriptor object (section 2.2.22) and OpenGL [OPENGL] records (section 2.3.9).

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject
member.summary: The Header object defines the EMF metafile header. It specifies properties of the device on which the image in the metafile was created.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.Bounds
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF RectL object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.19) that specifies the rectangular inclusive-inclusive bounds in device units of the smallest rectangle that can be drawn around the image stored in the metafile

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.Frame
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF RectL object that specifies the rectangular inclusive-inclusive dimensions, in .01 millimeter units, of a rectangle that surrounds the image stored in the metafile

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.RecordSignature
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the record signature. This MUST be ENHMETA_SIGNATURE, from the FormatSignature enumeration (section 2.1.14).

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets Version (4 bytes): A 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies EMF metafile interoperability. This SHOULD be 0x00010000

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.Bytes
member.summary: Gets or sets 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size of the metafile, in bytes.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.Records
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the number of records in the metafile

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.Handles
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the number of graphics objects that will be used during the processing of the metafile

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.Reserved
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that MUST be 0x0000 and MUST be ignored

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.NDesription
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the number of characters in the array that contains the description of the metafile's contents. This is zero if there is no description string.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.OffDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the offset from the beginning of this record to the array that contains the description of the metafile's contents

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.NPalEntries
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the number of entries in the metafile palette. The palette is located in the EMR_EOF record

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.Device
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF SizeL object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.22) that specifies the size of the reference device, in pixels

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.Millimeters
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF SizeL object that specifies the size of the reference device, in millimeters

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderObject.Valid
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is valid.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderExtension1.CbPixelFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size of the PixelFormatDescriptor object. This MUST be 0x00000000 if no pixel format is set

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderExtension1.OffPixelFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the offset to the PixelFormatDescriptor object. This MUST be 0x00000000 if no pixel format is set.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderExtension1.BOpenGl
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that indicates whether OpenGL commands are present in the metafile. 0x00000000 OpenGL records are not present in the metafile. 0x00000001 OpenGL records are present in the metafile.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderExtension2
member.summary: The HeaderExtension2 object defines the second extension to the EMF metafile header. It adds the ability to measure device surfaces in micrometers, which enhances the resolution and scalability of EMF metafiles.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderExtension2.MicrometersX
member.summary: Gets or sets the 32-bit horizontal size of the display device for which the metafile image was generated, in micrometers

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfHeaderExtension2.MicrometersY
member.summary: Gets or sets the 32-bit vertical size of the display device for which the metafile image was generated, in micrometers.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogBrushEx
member.summary: The LogBrushEx object defines the style, color, and pattern of a device-independent brush.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogBrushEx.BrushStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the brush style. The value MUST be an enumeration from WMF BrushStyle enumeration ([MS-WMF] section 2.1.1.4). The style values that are supported in this structure are listed later in this section. The BS_NULL style SHOULD be used to specify a brush that has no effect.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogBrushEx.Argb32ColorRef
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit WMF ColorRef object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.8) that specifies a color. The interpretation of this field depends on the value of BrushStyle, as explained in the following table.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogBrushEx.BrushHatch
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned field that contains the brush hatch data. Its interpretation depends on the value of BrushStyle,

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont
member.summary: The LogFont object specifies the basic attributes of a logical font.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit signed integer that specifies the height, in logical units, of the font's character cell or character. The character height value, also known as the em size, is the character cell height value minus the internal leading value. The font mapper SHOULD interpret the value specified in the Height field in the following manner.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit signed integer that specifies the average width, in logical units, of characters in the font. If the Width field value is zero, an appropriate value SHOULD be calculated from other LogFont values to find a font that has the typographer's intended aspect ratio

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.Escapement
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit signed integer that specifies the angle, in tenths of degrees, between the escapement vector and the x-axis of the device. The escapement vector is parallel to the baseline of a row of text.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit signed integer that specifies the angle, in tenths of degrees, between each character's baseline and the x-axis of the device.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.Weight
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit signed integer that specifies the weight of the font in the range zero through 1000. For example, 400 is normal and 700 is bold. If this value is zero, a default weight can be used.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.Italic
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies an italic font if set to 0x01; otherwise, it MUST be set to 0x00.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.Underline
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies an underlined font if set to 0x01; otherwise, it MUST be set to 0x00.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.StrikeOut
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies a strikeout font if set to 0x01; otherwise, it MUST be set to 0x00.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.CharSet
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the set of character glyphs. It MUST be a value in the WMF CharacterSet enumeration ([MS-WMF] section 2.1.1.5). If the character set is unknown, metafile processing SHOULD NOT attempt to translate or interpret strings that are rendered with that font.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.OutPrecision
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the output precision. The output precision defines how closely the font is required to match the requested height, width, character orientation, escapement, pitch, and font type. It MUST be a value from the WMF OutPrecision enumeration

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.ClipPrecision
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the clipping precision. The clipping precision defines how to clip characters that are partially outside the clipping region. It can be one or more of the WMF ClipPrecision Flags

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.Quality
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the output quality. The output quality defines how closely to attempt to match the logical-font attributes to those of an actual physical font. It MUST be one of the values in the WMF FontQuality enumeration ([MS-WMF] section 2.1.1.10).

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.PitchAndFamily
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF PitchAndFamily object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.14) that specifies the pitch and family of the font. Font families describe the look of a font in a general way. They are intended for specifying a font when the specified typeface is not available.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont.Facename
member.summary: Gets or sets a Facename (64 bytes): A string of no more than 32 Unicode characters that specifies the typeface name of the font. If the length of this string is less than 32 characters, a terminating NULL MUST be present, after which the remainder of this field MUST be ignored.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontEx
member.summary: The LogFontEx object specifies the extended attributes of a logical font.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontEx.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontEx.FullName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string of 64 Unicode characters that contains the font's full name. If the length of this string is less than 64 characters, a terminating NULL MUST be present, after which the remainder of this field MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontEx.Style
member.summary: Gets or sets a string of 32 Unicode characters that defines the font's style. If the length of this string is less than 32 characters, a terminating NULL MUST be present, after which the remainder of this field MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontEx.Script
member.summary: Gets or sets a string of 32 Unicode characters that defines the character set of the font. If the length of this string is less than 32 characters, a terminating NULL MUST be present, after which the remainder of this field MUST be ignored.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontExDv
member.summary: The LogFontExDv object specifies the design vector for an extended logical font.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontExDv.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontEx)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontExDv.DesignVector
member.summary: Gets or sets a DesignVector object (section 2.2.3). This field MUST NOT be longer than 72 bytes.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontPanose
member.summary: The LogFontPanose object specifies the PANOSE characteristics of a logical font.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontPanose.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFont)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontPanose.FullName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string of 64 Unicode characters that defines the font's full name. If the length of this string is less than 64 characters, a terminating NULL MUST be present, after which the remainder of this field MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontPanose.Style
member.summary: Gets or sets a string of 32 Unicode characters that defines the font's style. If the length of this string is less than 32 characters, a terminating NULL MUST be present, after which the remainder of this field MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontPanose.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets This field MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontPanose.StyleSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the point size at which font hinting is performed. If set to zero, font hinting is performed at the point size corresponding to the Height field in the LogFont object in the LogFont field

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontPanose.Match
member.summary: Gets or sets This field MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontPanose.Reserved
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that MUST be set to zero and MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontPanose.VendorId
member.summary: Gets or sets This field MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontPanose.Culture
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that MUST be set to zero and MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontPanose.Panose
member.summary: Gets or sets a Panose object (section 2.2.21) that specifies the PANOSE characteristics of the logical font. If all fields of this object are zero, it MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogFontPanose.Padding
member.summary: Gets or sets a field that exists only to ensure 32-bit alignment of this structure. It MUST be ignored

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPalette
member.summary: The LogPalette object specifies a logical_palette that contains device-independent color definitions.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPalette.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the version number of the system. This MUST be 0x0300.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPalette.NumberOfEntries
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the number of LogPaletteEntry objects (section 2.2.18) in the PaletteEntries field.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPalette.PaletteArgb32Entries
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of 32-bit ARGB colors.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPen
member.summary: The LogPen object defines the style, width, and color of a logical pen.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPen.PenStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the PenStyle. The value MUST be defined from the PenStyle enumeration table, specified in section 2.1.25.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPen.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF PointL object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.15) that specifies the width of the pen by the value of its x field. The value of its y field MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPen.Argb32ColorRef
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF ColorRef object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.8) that specifies the pen color value.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPenEx
member.summary: The LogPenEx object specifies the style, width, and color of an extended logical pen.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPenEx.PenStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the pen style

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPenEx.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the width of the line drawn by the pen. If the pen type in the PenStyle field is PS_GEOMETRIC, this value is the width in logical units; otherwise, the width is specified in device units. If the pen type in the PenStyle field is PS_COSMETIC, this value MUST be 0x00000001.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPenEx.BrushStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies a brush style for the pen from the WMF BrushStyle enumeration ([MS-WMF] section 2.1.1.4). If the pen type in the PenStyle field is PS_GEOMETRIC, this value MUST be either BS_SOLID or BS_HATCHED. The value of this field can be BS_NULL, but only if the line style specified in PenStyle is PS_NULL. The BS_NULL style SHOULD be used to specify a brush that has no effect.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPenEx.Argb32ColorRef
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF ColorRef object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.8). The interpretation of this field depends on the BrushStyle value, as shown in the table later in this section.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPenEx.BrushHatch
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush hatch pattern. The definition of this field depends on the BrushStyle value, as shown in the table later in this section.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPenEx.NumStyleEntities
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of elements in the array specified in the StyleEntry field. This value SHOULD be zero if PenStyle does not specify PS_USERSTYLE.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPenEx.StyleEntry
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional array of 32-bit unsigned integers that defines the lengths of dashes and gaps in the line drawn by this pen, when the value of PenStyle is PS_USERSTYLE line style for the pen. The array contains a number of entries specified by NumStyleEntries, but it is used as if it repeated indefinitely The first entry in the array specifies the length of the first dash. The second entry specifies the length of the first gap. Thereafter, lengths of dashes and gaps alternate. If the pen type in the PenStyle field is PS_GEOMETRIC, the lengths are specified in logical units; otherwise, the lengths are specified in device units.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfLogPenEx.BrushDibPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the brush dib pattern.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPanose
member.summary: The Panose object describes the PANOSE font-classification values for a TrueType font. These characteristics are used to associate the font with other fonts of similar appearance but different names.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPanose.FamilyType
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the family type. The value MUST be in the FamilyType (section 2.1.12) enumeration table.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPanose.SerifStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the serif style. The value MUST be in the SerifType (section 2.1.30) enumeration table.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPanose.Weight
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the weight of the font. The value MUST be in the Weight (section 2.1.34) enumeration table.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPanose.Proportion
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the proportion of the font. The value MUST be in the Proportion (section 2.1.28) enumeration table.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPanose.Contrast
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the contrast of the font. The value MUST be in the Contrast (section 2.1.8) enumeration table.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPanose.StrokeVariation
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the stroke variation for the font. The value MUST be in the StrokeVariation (section 2.1.33) enumeration table.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPanose.ArmStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the arm style of the font. The value MUST be in the ArmStyle (section 2.1.3) enumeration table.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPanose.Letterform
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the letterform of the font. The value MUST be in the Letterform (section 2.1.20) enumeration table

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPanose.Midline
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the midline of the font. The value MUST be in the MidLine (section 2.1.23) enumeration table.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPanose.XHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies the x height of the font. The value MUST be in the XHeight (section 2.1.35) enumeration table.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor
member.summary: The PixelFormatDescriptor object can be used in EMR_HEADER records (section 2.3.4.2) to specify the pixel format of the output surface for the playback device context.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.NSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of this data structure.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.NVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit integer that MUST be set to 0x0001.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.DwFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets bit flags that specify properties of the pixel buffer that is used for output to the drawing surface. These properties are not all mutually exclusive; combinations of flags are allowed, except where noted otherwise.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.IPixelType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of pixel data PFD_TYPE_RGBA 0x00 The pixel format is RGBA. PFD_TYPE_COLORINDEX 0x01 Each pixel is an index in a color table.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CColorBits
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of bits per pixel for RGBA pixel types, excluding the alpha bitplanes. For color table pixels, it is the size of each color table index

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CRedBits
member.summary: Gets or sets Specifies the number of red bitplanes in each RGBA color buffer

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CRedShift
member.summary: Gets or sets Specifies the shift count in bits for red bitplanes in each RGBA color buffer.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CGreenBits
member.summary: Gets or sets Specifies the number of green bitplanes in each RGBA color buffer

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CGreenShift
member.summary: Gets or sets Specifies the shift count for green bitplanes in each RGBA color buffer.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CBlueBits
member.summary: Gets or sets Specifies the number of blue bitplanes in each RGBA color buffer.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CBlueShift
member.summary: Gets or sets Specifies the shift count for blue bitplanes in each RGBA color buffer.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CAlphaBits
member.summary: Gets or sets Specifies the number of alpha bitplanes in each RGBA color buffer

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CAlphaShift
member.summary: Gets or sets Specifies the shift count for alpha bitplanes in each RGBA color buffer

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CAccumBits
member.summary: Gets or sets specifies the total number of bitplanes in the accumulation buffer.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CAccumRedBits
member.summary: Gets or sets specifies the number of red bitplanes in the accumulation buffer

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CAccumGreenBits
member.summary: Gets or sets specifies the number of green bitplanes in the accumulation

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CAccumBlueBits
member.summary: Gets or sets specifies the number of blue bitplanes in the accumulation buffer.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CAccumAlphaBits
member.summary: Gets or sets specifies the number of alpha bitplanes in the accumulation buffer

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CDepthBits
member.summary: Gets or sets specifies the depth of the depth (z-axis) buffer.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CStencilBits
member.summary: Gets or sets specifies the depth of the stencil buffer.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.CAuxBuffers
member.summary: Gets or sets specifies the number of auxiliary buffers. Auxiliary buffers are not supported

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.ILayerType
member.summary: Gets or sets This field MAY be ignored

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.BReserved
member.summary: Gets or sets specifies the number of overlay and underlay planes. Bits 0 through 3 specify up to 15 overlay planes and bits 4 through 7 specify up to 15 underlay planes

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.DwLayerMask
member.summary: Gets or sets This field MAY be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.DwVisibleMask
member.summary: Gets or sets specifies the transparent color or index of an underlay plane. When the pixel type is RGBA, dwVisibleMask is a transparent RGB color value. When the pixel type is color index, it is a transparent index value.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPixelFormatDescriptor.DwDamageMask
member.summary: Gets or sets This field MAY be ignored

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPoint28To4
member.summary: The Point28_4 object represents the location of a point on a device surface with coordinates in 28.4 bit FIX notation.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPoint28To4.X
member.summary: Gets or sets a BitFIX28_4 object (section 2.2.1) that represents the horizontal coordinate of the point.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfPoint28To4.Y
member.summary: Gets or sets a BitFIX28_4 object that represents the vertical coordinate of the point.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfRegionData
member.summary: The RegionData object specifies data that defines a region, which is made of non-overlapping rectangles.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfRegionData.RegionDataHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets a 256-bit RegionDataHeader object that describes the following data.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfRegionData.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of WMF RectL objects ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.19); the objects are merged to create the region

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfRegionDataHeader
member.summary: The RegionDataHeader object describes the properties of a RegionData object.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfRegionDataHeader.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size of this object in bytes. This MUST be 0x00000020.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfRegionDataHeader.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the region type. This SHOULD be RDH_RECTANGLES (0x00000001).

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfRegionDataHeader.CountRects
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the number of rectangles in this region.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfRegionDataHeader.RgnSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size of the buffer of rectangles in bytes.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfRegionDataHeader.Bounds
member.summary: Gets or sets a 128-bit WMF RectL object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.19), which specifies the bounds of the region.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfText
member.summary: The EmrText object contains values for text output.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfText.Reference
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF PointL object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.15) that specifies the coordinates of the reference point used to position the string. The reference point is defined by the last EMR_SETTEXTALIGN record (section 2.3.11.25). If no such record has been set, the default alignment is TA_LEFT,TA_TOP.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfText.Chars
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the number of characters in the string

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfText.OffString
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the offset to the output string, in bytes, from the start of the record in which this object is contained. This value MUST be 8- or 16-bit aligned, according to the character format

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfText.Options
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies how to use the rectangle specified in the Rectangle field. This field can be a combination of more than one ExtTextOutOptions enumeration (section 2.1.11) values

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfText.Rectangle
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional WMF RectL object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.19) that defines a clipping and/or opaquing rectangle in logical units. This rectangle is applied to the text output performed by the containing record.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfText.OffDx
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the offset to an inter character spacing array, in bytes, from the start of the record in which this object is contained. This value MUST be 32-bit aligned.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfText.StringBuffer
member.summary: Gets or sets the character string buffer UndefinedSpace1 (variable): An optional number of unused bytes. The OutputString field is not required to follow immediately the preceding portion of this structure. OutputString (variable): An array of characters that specify the string to output. The location of this field is specified by the value of offString in bytes from the start of this record. The number of characters is specified by the value of Chars.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfText.DxBuffer
member.summary: Gets or sets the optional character spacing buffer UndefinedSpace2 (variable): An optional number of unused bytes. The OutputDx field is not required to follow immediately the preceding portion of this structure. OutputDx (variable): An array of 32-bit unsigned integers that specify the output spacing between the origins of adjacent character cells in logical units. The location of this field is specified by the value of offDx in bytes from the start of this record. If spacing is defined, this field contains the same number of values as characters in the output string. If the Options field of the EmrText object contains the ETO_PDY flag, then this buffer contains twice as many values as there are characters in the output string, one horizontal and one vertical offset for each, in that order. If ETO_RTLREADING is specified, characters are laid right to left instead of left to right. No other options affect the interpretation of this field.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfTriVertex
member.summary: The TriVertex object specifies color and position information for the definition of a rectangle or triangle vertex.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfTriVertex.X
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit signed integer that specifies the horizontal position, in logical units.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfTriVertex.Y
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit signed integer that specifies the vertical position, in logical units.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfTriVertex.Red
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the red color value for the point.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfTriVertex.Green
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the green color value for the point.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfTriVertex.Blue
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the blue color value for the point.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfTriVertex.Alpha
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the alpha transparency value for the point.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfUniversalFontId
member.summary: The UniversalFontId object defines a mechanism for identifying fonts in EMF metafiles.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfUniversalFontId.Checksum
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that is the checksum of the font. The checksum value has the following meanings. 0x00000000 The object is a device font. 0x00000001 The object is a Type 1 font that has been installed on the client machine and is enumerated by the PostScript printer driver as a device font. 0x00000002 The object is not a font but is a Type 1 rasterizer. 3 value The object is a bitmap, vector, or TrueType font, or a Type 1 rasterized font that was created by a Type 1 rasterizer.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Objects.EmfUniversalFontId.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that is an index associated with the font object. The meaning of this field is determined by the type of font.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfAlphaBlend
member.summary: The EMR_ALPHABLEND record specifies a block transfer of pixels from a source bitmap to a destination rectangle, including alpha transparency data, according to a specified blending operation.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfBitmapRecordType
member.summary: The bitmap record types perform block transfers of bitmap images.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord
member.summary: Base class for EMF records All EMF records MUST have a length that is a multiple of 4 bytes. This is depicted in the generic structures of the preceding EMF record types by including AlignmentPadding fields where appropriate at the ends of these structures. The contents of AlignmentPadding fields MUST always be ignored. For brevity, these fields are not shown in every individual EMF record definition.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.EmfImage)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the parent.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the record

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfBitmapRecordType.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfAlphaBlend.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfAlphaBlend.Bounds
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF RectL object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.19) that defines the destination bounding rectangle in device units.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfAlphaBlend.XDest
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit signed integer that specifies the logical x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfAlphaBlend.YDest
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit signed integer that specifies the logical y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfAlphaBlend.CxDest
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit signed integer that specifies the logical width of the destination rectangle. This value MUST be greater than zero.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfAngleArc
member.summary: The EMR_ANGLEARC record specifies a line segment of an arc. The line segment is drawn from the current position to the beginning of the arc. The arc is drawn along the perimeter of a circle with the given radius and center. The length of the arc is defined by the given start and sweep angles

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfBlendFunction
member.summary: A structure that specifies the blending operations for source and destination bitmaps.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfBlendFunction.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfBlendFunction.BlendOperation
member.summary: Gets or sets the blend operation code. The only source and destination blend operation that has been defined is 0x00, which specifies that the source bitmap MUST be combined with the destination bitmap based on the alpha transparency values of the source pixels. See the following equations for details.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfBlendFunction.BlendFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets This value MUST be 0x00 and MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfBlendFunction.SrcConstantAlpha
member.summary: Gets or sets an 8-bit unsigned integer that specifies alpha transparency, which determines the blend of the source and destination bitmaps. This value MUST be used on the entire source bitmap. The minimum alpha transparency value, zero, corresponds to completely transparent the maximum value, 0xFF, corresponds to completely opaque. In effect, a value of 0xFF specifies that the per-pixel alpha values determine the blend of the source and destination bitmaps. See the equations later in this section for details.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfBlendFunction.AlphaFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a structure that specifies how source and destination pixels are interpreted with respect to alpha transparency.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfBlendFunction.AlphaFormatEnum
member.summary: A structure that specifies how source and destination pixels are interpreted with respect to alpha transparency.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfBlendFunction.AlphaFormatEnum.NotTransparency
member.summary: The pixels in the source bitmap do not specify alpha transparency. In this case, the SrcConstantAlpha value determines the blend of the source and destination bitmaps. Note that in the following equations SrcConstantAlpha is divided by 255, which produces a value in the range 0 to 1.

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfBlendFunction.AlphaFormatEnum.AC_SRC_ALPHA
member.summary: Indicates that the source bitmap is 32 bits-per-pixel and specifies an alpha transparency value for each pixel.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfColorMatchToTargetW
member.summary: The EMR_COLORMATCHTOTARGETW record specifies whether to perform color matching with a color profile that is specified in a file with a name consisting of Unicode characters.
member.remarks: An EMR_COLORMATCHTOTARGETW record can be used to control whether to apply the current color transform in the playback device context. If the dwAction value is CS_ENABLE, color mapping is enabled, and the current color transform SHOULD be applied to subsequent graphics operations. If dwAction is set to CS_DISABLE, the color transform SHOULD NOT be applied. While color mapping to the target is enabled by a dwAction value of CS_ENABLE, changes to the color space or color gamut mapping are not applied. However, those changes MUST take effect when color mapping to the target is disabled. The dwAction field SHOULD NOT be set to CS_DELETE_TRANSFORM unless color management has already been enabled with an EMR_SETICMMODE record (section 2.3.11.14).

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfStateRecordType
member.summary: The state record types specify and manage graphics properties that define the state of the playback device context.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfComment.PrivateData
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional array of bytes that specifies the private data. The first DWORD of this data MUST NOT be one of the predefined comment identifier values specified in section 2.3.3. Private data is unknown to EMF; it is meaningful only to applications that know the format of the data and how to use it. EMR_COMMENT private data records MAY be ignored.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentEmfSpool.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentRecordType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentEmfSpool.CommentIdentifier
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that identifies this comment record as containing EMFSPOOL records. The value 0x00000000 identifies this as an EMR_COMMENT_EMFSPOOL record.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentEmfSpool.EmfSpoolRecordIdentifier
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that identifies the type of EMR_COMMENT_EMFSPOOL record.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentEmfSpool.EmfSpoolRecords
member.summary: Gets or sets a variable-length array of bytes that contains one or more EMFSPOOL font definition records ([MS-EMFSPOOL] section 2.2.3.3).

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentEmfSpool.EmfSpoolRecordIdentifierEnum
member.summary: Identifies the type of EMR_COMMENT_EMFSPOOL record

member.name: F:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentEmfSpool.EmfSpoolRecordIdentifierEnum.EmfSpoolFontDefinition
member.summary: The ASCII string "TONF", which identifies this as a record that contains embedded EMFSPOOL font definition data.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentEndGroup
member.summary: The EMR_COMMENT_ENDGROUP record specifies the end of a group of drawing records.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentEndGroup.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentPublicRecordType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentMultiFormats
member.summary: The EMR_COMMENT_MULTIFORMATS record specifies an image in multiple graphics formats.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentMultiFormats.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentPublicRecordType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentMultiFormats.OutputRect
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF RectL object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.19) that specifies the output rectangle, in logical coordinates.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentMultiFormats.CountFormats
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the number of graphics formats contained in this record.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentMultiFormats.AFormats
member.summary: Gets or sets a CountFormats length array of graphics formats, specified by EmrFormat objects (section 2.2.4), in order of preference

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentMultiFormats.FormatData
member.summary: Gets or sets a variable-length array of bytes of image data for all graphics formats contained in this record. The size of the data for each image is provided by the DataSize field in the corresponding EmrFormat object. Thus, the total size of this field is the sum of DataSize values in all EmrFormat objects. The graphics format of the data for each image is specified by the Signature field in the corresponding EmrFormat object.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentWindowsMetaFile
member.summary: The EMR_COMMENT_WINDOWS_METAFILE record specifies an image in an embedded WMF metafile.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentWindowsMetaFile.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentPublicRecordType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentWindowsMetaFile.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit unsigned integer that specifies the WMF metafile version in terms of support for device-independent bitmaps (DIBs), from the WMF MetafileVersion enumeration ([MS-WMF] section 2.1.1.19).

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentWindowsMetaFile.Reserved
member.summary: Gets or sets a 16-bit value that MUST be 0x0000 and MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentWindowsMetaFile.Checksum
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the checksum for this record.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentWindowsMetaFile.Flags
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit value that MUST be 0x00000000 and MUST be ignored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentWindowsMetaFile.WinMetafileSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of the WMF metafile in the WinMetafile field.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCommentWindowsMetaFile.WinMetafile
member.summary: Gets or sets a buffer that contains the WMF metafile.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfControlRecordType
member.summary: The control record types define the start and end of an EMF metafile and properties of the metafile.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfControlRecordType.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateBrushInDirect
member.summary: The EMR_CREATEBRUSHINDIRECT record defines a logical brush for graphics operations.

The logical brush object defined by this record can be selected into the playback device context by an EMR_SELECTOBJECT record (section 2.3.8.5), which specifies the logical brush to use in subsequent graphics operations.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfObjectCreationRecordType
member.summary: The object creation record types create graphics objects.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfObjectCreationRecordType.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateBrushInDirect.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateBrushInDirect.IhBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets A 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the index of the logical brush object in the EMF Object Table (section 3.1.1.1). This index MUST be saved so that this object can be reused or modified.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateBrushInDirect.LogBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets A LogBrushEx object (section 2.2.12) that specifies the style, color, and pattern of the logical brush. The BrushStyle field in this object MUST be BS_SOLID, BS_HATCHED, or BS_NULL.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateColorSpace
member.summary: The EMR_CREATECOLORSPACE record creates a logical color space object from a color profile with a name consisting of ASCII characters.
member.remarks: The logical color space object defined by this record can be selected into the playback device context by an EMR_SETCOLORSPACE record (section 2.3.8.7), which defines the logical color space to use in subsequent graphics operations.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateColorSpace.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateColorSpace.IhCS
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the index of the logical color space object in the EMF object table (section 3.1.1.1). This index MUST be saved so that this object can be reused or modified.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateColorSpace.Lcs
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF LogColorSpace object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.11), which can specify the name of a color profile in ASCII characters.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateColorSpaceW
member.summary: The EMR_CREATECOLORSPACEW record creates a logical color space object from a color profile with a name consisting of Unicode characters.
member.remarks: The logical color space object defined by this record can be selected into the playback device context by an EMR_SETCOLORSPACE record (section 2.3.8.7), which defines the logical color space to use in subsequent graphics operations.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateColorSpaceW.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateColorSpaceW.IhCS
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the index of the logical color space object in the EMF object table (section 3.1.1.1). This index MUST be saved so that this object can be reused or modified.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateColorSpaceW.Lcs
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF LogColorSpaceW object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.12) that can specify the name of a color profile in Unicode UTF16-LE characters

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateColorSpaceW.DwFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that provides information about the data in this record.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateColorSpaceW.CbData
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of the Data field.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateColorSpaceW.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional array of bytes that specifies color profile data.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateDibPatternBrushPt
member.summary: The EMR_CREATEDIBPATTERNBRUSHPT record defines a pattern brush for graphics operations. The pattern is specified by a DIB.
member.remarks: The pattern brush object defined by this record can be selected into the playback device context by an EMR_SELECTOBJECT record (section 2.3.8.5), which specifies the pattern brush to use in subsequent graphics operations.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateDibPatternBrushPt.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateDibPatternBrushPt.IhBrush
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the index of the pattern brush object in the EMF Object Table (section 3.1.1.1). This index MUST be saved so that this object can be reused or modified.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateDibPatternBrushPt.Usage
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies how to interpret values in the color table in the DIB header. This value MUST be in the DIBColors enumeration (section 2.1.9).

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateDibPatternBrushPt.OffBmi
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the offset from the start of this record to the DIB header.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateDibPatternBrushPt.CbBmi
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size of the DIB header.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateDibPatternBrushPt.OffBits
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the offset from the start of this record to the DIB bits.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateDibPatternBrushPt.CbBits
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size of the DIB bits.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateDibPatternBrushPt.BitmapBuffer
member.summary: Gets or sets a buffer containing a packed DIB in the form of a WMF DeviceIndependentBitmap object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.9). It is not required to be contiguous with the fixed portion of the EMR_CREATEDIBPATTERNBRUSHPT record.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateMonoBrush
member.summary: The EMR_CREATEMONOBRUSH record defines a monochrome pattern brush for graphics operations. The pattern is specified by a monochrome DIB.

member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the index of the monochrome pattern brush object in the EMF Object Table (section 3.1.1.1). This index MUST be saved so that this object can be reused or modified.

member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies how to interpret values in the color table in the DIB header. This value MUST be in the DIBColors enumeration (section 2.1.9).

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateMonoBrush.OffBmi
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the offset from the start of this record to the DIB header.

member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size of the DIB header.

member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the offset from the start of this record to the DIB bits.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreateMonoBrush.CbBits
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size of the DIB bits.

member.summary: Gets or sets a buffer containing a packed DIB in the form of a WMF DeviceIndependentBitmap object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.9). It is not required to be contiguous with the fixed portion of the EMR_CREATEDIBPATTERNBRUSHPT record.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreatePalette
member.summary: The EMR_CREATEPALETTE record defines a logical palette for graphics operations.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreatePalette.IhPal
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the index of the logical palette object in the EMF Object Table (section 3.1.1.1). This index MUST be saved so that this object can be reused or modified.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreatePalette.LogPalette
member.summary: Gets or sets a LogPalette object (section 2.2.17). The Version field of this object MUST be set to 0x0300. If the NumberOfEntries value in this object is zero, processing of this record MUST fail.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreatePen
member.summary: The EMR_CREATEPEN record defines a logical pen for graphics operations.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreatePen.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreatePen.IhPen
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the index of the logical pen object in the EMF Object Table (section 3.1.1.1). This index MUST be saved so that this object can be reused or modified.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfCreatePen.LogPen
member.summary: Gets or sets a LogPen object (section 2.2.19) that specifies the style, width, and color of the logical pen.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfDeleteColorSpace
member.summary: The EMR_DELETECOLORSPACE record deletes a logical color space object.
member.remarks: An EMR_DELETEOBJECT record SHOULD be used instead of EMR_DELETECOLORSPACE to delete a logical color space object.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfDeleteColorSpace.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfDeleteColorSpace.IhCS
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the index of a logical color space object in the EMF Object Table (section 3.1.1.1).
member.remarks: This object is either a WMF LogColorSpace or LogColorSpaceW object ([MS-WMF] sections 2.2.2.11 and 2.2.2.12, respectively).

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfDeleteObject
member.summary: The EMR_DELETEOBJECT record deletes a graphics object, which is specified by its index in the EMF Object Table(section 3.1.1.1).

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfDeleteObject.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfDeleteObject.ObjectHandle
member.summary: Gets or sets 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies either the index of a graphics object in the EMF Object Table or the index of a stock object from the StockObject enumeration.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfDrawEscape
member.summary: The EMR_DRAWESCAPE record passes arbitrary information to a printer driver. The intent is that the information will result in drawing being done.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEscapeRecordType
member.summary: The escape record types execute printer driver functions.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEscapeRecordType.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEscapeRecordType.IEscape
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the printer driver escape to execute. This MUST be one of the values in the WMF MetafileEscapes enumeration ([MSWMF] section 2.1.1.17).

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfDrawEscape.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfDrawEscape.CjIn
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer specifying the number of bytes to pass to the printer driver.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfDrawEscape.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets the data to pass to the printer driver. There MUST be cjIn bytes available.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEllipse
member.summary: The EMR_ELLIPSE record specifies an ellipse. The center of the ellipse is the center of the specified bounding rectangle. The ellipse is outlined by using the current pen and is filled by using the current brush.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEllipse.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEllipse.Box
member.summary: Gets or sets a 128-bit (WMF) RectL object, specified in [MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.19, which specifies the inclusive-inclusive bounding rectangle.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEof
member.summary: The EMR_EOF record indicates the end of the metafile and specifies a palette.

member.name: M:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEof.#ctor(Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfRecord)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEof.NPalEntries
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the number of palette entries.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEof.OffPalEntries
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the offset to the palette entries from the start of this record.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEof.PaletteBuffer
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional buffer that contains palette data, which is not required to be contiguous with the fixed portion of the EMR_EOF record. Accordingly, fields in this buffer that are labeled "UndefinedSpace" are optional and MUST be ignored. The size of this field MUST be a multiple of 4 bytes

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEof.PaletteArgb32Entries
member.summary: Gets or sets an array of 32-bit ARGB color and usage of each entry in the logical_palette.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfEof.SizeLast
member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that MUST be the same as Size and MUST be the last field of the record and hence the metafile. LogPaletteEntry objects, if they exist, MUST precede this field.

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfExcludeClipRect
member.summary: The EMR_EXCLUDECLIPRECT record specifies a new clipping region that consists of the existing clipping region minus the specified rectangle. Note Fields that are not described in this section are specified in section 2.3.2.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfExcludeClipRect.Clip
member.summary: Gets or sets a WMF RectL object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.19) that specifies the clipping rectangle in logical units.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets or sets 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the index of the extended logical pen object in the EMF Object Table (section 3.1.1.1). This index MUST be saved so that this object can be reused or modified.

member.summary: Gets or sets 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the size of the DIB bits, if the record contains a DIB.

member.name: P:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfExtCreatePen.Elp

member.name: T:Aspose.Imaging.FileFormats.Emf.Emf.Records.EmfGradientFill
member.summary: The EMR_GRADIENTFILL record specifies filling rectangles or triangles with gradients of color.
member.remarks: An EMR_GRADIENTFILL record that specifies that the three vertexes of a triangle SHOULD fill the figure with smooth gradients of colors.[85] An EMR_GRADIENTFILL record that specifies that the upper-left and lower-right vertexes of a rectangle SHOULD fill the figure with smooth gradients of color. There are two gradient fill modes in the GradientFill enumeration that can be used when drawing a rectangle. In GRADIENT_FILL_RECT_H mode, the rectangle is filled from left to right. In GRADIENT_FILL_RECT_V mode, the rectangle is filled from top to bottom. Note An EMR_GRADIENTFILL record MUST ignore the Alpha fields in the TriVertex objects. An EMR_ALPHABLEND record (section 2.3.1.1) that immediately follows the EMR_GRADIENTFILL record can be used to apply an alpha transparency gradient to the filled area.

member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the number of vertexes.

member.summary: Gets or sets a 32-bit unsigned integer that specifies the number of rectangles or triangles to fill.
